verses.name: Job 36:17
verses.text: But thou hast fulfilled the judgment of the wicked: judgment and justice take hold on thee.

verses.name: Job 36:18
verses.text: Because there is wrath, beware lest he take thee away with his stroke: then a great ransom cannot deliver thee.

verses.name: Job 36:19
verses.text: Will he esteem thy riches? no, not gold, nor all the forces of strength.

verses.name: Job 36:20
verses.text: Desire not the night, when people are cut off in their place.

verses.name: Job 36:21
verses.text: Take heed, regard not iniquity: for this hast thou chosen rather than affliction.

verses.name: Job 36:22
verses.text: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?

verses.name: Job 36:23
verses.text: Who hath enjoined him his way? or who can say, Thou hast wrought iniquity?
